Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47.Controller

Class TurnController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47.Controller.TurnController
public class TurnController
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the controller of a turn. The GameController creates a new instance every time a new turn is going on and when it ends the instance is substituted.

    • TurnController

      public TurnController​(java.util.ArrayList<VirtualView> views, Game game, int indexOfCurrentPlayer, GameController controller)

  • Method Details

    • startTurn

      void startTurn()
      This method is called by the GameController to start a turn game.

    • setWorkerGender

      public void setWorkerGender​(int[] position)
      This method sets the workerGender chosen by the player for this turn. If he selected a slot where there isn't one of his workers, the controller asks again. If he selected a paralyzed worker, the controller forced him to use the other one sending him an advice.
      Parameters:
      position - the coordinates of the slot where is located the chosen worker.

    • executeAction

      public void executeAction​(Action action, Direction direction)
      This method is the main actor in a turn. It sets which action has been selected and if is the player is allowed to, it executes it; otherwise, it sends an error and ask again.
      Parameters:
      action - the action chosen by the player
      direction - the direction chosen by the player

    • move

      private void move​(Direction direction)
      This method executes a move. There are several check before the model's method is called: if all of them are negative, the action is executed. Otherwise, it sends an error and asks again.
      Parameters:
      direction - the direction where the worker is going to move

    • build

      private void build​(Direction direction)
      This method executes a build. There are several check before the model's method is called: if all of them are negative, the action is executed. Otherwise, it sends an error and asks again.
      Parameters:
      direction - the direction where the worker is going to build

    • buildDome

      private void buildDome​(Direction direction)
      This method executes a dome building. There are several check before the model's method is called: if all of them are negative, the action is executed. Otherwise, it sends an error and asks again.
      Parameters:
      direction - the direction where the worker is going to build a dome

      Gender getWorkerGender()

      Turn getTurn()

    • getGame

      Game getGame()
